meanings.definition: Drink plentiful amounts of alcohol and enjoy oneself with others in a noisy, lively way.
meanings.sent1: After work, the friends decided to carouse at the local pub.
meanings.sent2: During the festival, people would carouse and dance in the streets.
meanings.sent3: The group's carouse at the party was so loud that the neighbors complained.
meanings.sent4: The laughter and cheers filled the room as they continued to carouse into the night.
meanings.sent5: The scene of friends carousing together was a picture of joy and celebration.

meanings.definition: Engage in a noisy, lively drinking party.
meanings.sent1: They planned to carouse all night long to celebrate their friend's birthday.
meanings.sent2: The group decided to carouse at the beach bonfire, enjoying drinks and music.
meanings.sent3: The carouse at the wedding reception was filled with laughter and toasts.
meanings.sent4: The bar echoed with the sounds of people carousing and having a good time.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere was festive as they began to carouse and share stories.
